name: NULL (Chukobyte, Dmytro Nebesh, PineappleOnPizza)
description:
A game made  in a week for the KB Games Zelda Jam '22.  Made with Seika Engine and the source can be found here.  Will submit a final build at the end of the jam.

Controls Keyboard
  • Move: WASD, Arrow Keys
  • Attack: Space
  • Bomb: E
Controller (Xbox)
  • Move: Left Analog
  • Attack: A Button
  • Attack: B Button

Note: The bomb is unlocked through play

Credits
  • Chukobyte - Programming
  • Pine - Art
  • Dnebesh - Audio
